title: [Large-scale] Language education design through a constructivist cyclic blended learning model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Application of a four-stage (translation-chunking-execution-integration) cyclical learning model promoting learners' cognitive processing, operated with formative assessments using digital devices

learning_goals: Can design language projects using the four-stage cyclical learning model (translation-chunking-execution-integration)
Can iteratively improve language projects three or more times incorporating peer feedback in blended learning environments
Can systematically document and self-assess learning processes through digital portfolios (blogs/wikis)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
